item.title: Software packages with more than 2 billion weekly downloads hit in supply-chain attack
item.description: Incident hitting npm users is likely the biggest supply-chain attack ever.

item.title: Supply-chain attacks on open source software are getting out of hand
item.description: Attacks affected packages, including one with ~2.8 million weekly downloads.
